name: atancl

stmt.origin: eleq2s(c0, cdm(catan), cdif(cc, cpr(cneg(ci), ci)), wcel(cfv(catan, c0), cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(catan)), wcel(cfv(catan, c0), cc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(cneg(ci), ci))), wcel(cfv(catan, c0), cc))
-| wceq(cdm(catan), cdif(cc, cpr(cneg(ci), ci)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ dom(arctan)→(arctan ` c0)∈ ℂ)
⊣ (c0 ∈(ℂ \ { -u(i), i })→(arctan ` c0)∈ ℂ)
⊣ dom(arctan)=(ℂ \ { -u(i), i })
